name: Carolyn Abeyta
text: Blaze Pizza is delicious!  My family loves eating here because everyone can get exactly what they want!  The employees are friendly and helpful.  Today's Halloween and the employee dressed in the banana suit gave my family a bunch of Crunch bars!!  Thanks!!  Blaze Pizza is amazing!!!

name: Jamie Jones
text: 2 stars for being on-time. My pizza crust was burnt. I‚Äôve been gluten-free for 20 years, and this is easily my least favorite crust. (Even the unburnt parts) Everything was bland, and no amount of salt/pepper flakes could fix it. The white sauce was flavorless.

name: Nathaniel Bland
text: Good pizza with a good choice of topping. Great place to go if you have an allergy or celiac. They will do glove changes and have a special red sauce set aside for allergy pizzas. The cauliflower crust is awesome. Prefer it to their regular ‚Ä¶More

name: tommy riley
text: Pizza is always great! Tyler is always amazing and has great Costumer service. Always a good time at blaze!

name: Enrique Robledo
text: Great tasting pizza! Options are great!  Roasted squash salad was just slightly soggy but still had amazing flavor. Staff treated us well but I could tell that they were a little stressed. Tables were okay in cleanliness. Bathroom was ok as well. Blood orange lemonade was awesome. A little pricey but good quality.

name: gaythry raghunathan
text: I really love the build your own pizza their.. being a vegetarian it gives me option to put all the vegetables without worrying about the cost.

name: Parker Padilla
text: Love Blaze! Always great service & excellent pizza. Will definitely be returning

name: Jed Thacker
text: Build your own personal pizza a great bang for the buck especially if you like lots of quality toppings on your pizza!

name: Gabriel V.
text: Went in Saturday night with a group of 6.  Pizza is good.  I had the "Thick crust" and it was great... ask for extra sauce.   I do have to say, the staff were terrible.  I don't know if they were just over worked or if they were just bad. ‚Ä¶More

name: Margarita Naranjo
text: Their pizza is amazing!! But their staff is even better! It feels good to be greeted as you walk in! Very friendly, helpful staff!! Thank you!!!

name: Mrs Amanda Hall
text: Keto crust is eh and I didn't get much sauce on my pizza from a dude that wasn't really interested in making it but all other staff was super nice and their smores cookie is so damn amazing.

name: Barry Ore
text: I was all about this. I got the high-rise dough, which was definitely worth it. The staff was super friendly and helped me at the counter in deciding what I wanted. I also tried those dough nuts, and they were straight fire. I even got a ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Carpenter
text: Got allllmost everything right. Missed my wife's spinach topping on our online order. Always yummy though. But if the receipt says "spinach", you'd think they'd double check.

name: Xiaohan Wang
text: Highly recommend the Hawaii pizza here. Very juicy and fresh. Enjoyed the time here~

name: Nate
text: Delicious pizza and very good prices! My only gripe is that they don't seem to sell the garlic knots in larger quantities

name: Elizabeth Fulreader
text: Delicious!! The HotLink Pizza had wonderful zesty flavor. Will be back! Excited to try more signature pizzas üòª

name: Jeremy Burnell
text: Love the pizza here!  Best ingredients and the team is always consistent with all our orders from the beginning.  Took my wife here yesterday to get some takeout (due to COVID-19) for her Birthday.  Kourt prepared our pizzas just right, ‚Ä¶More

name: Blanca Alas
text: In my opinion it's one of the best places to eat pizza outside NYC and Italy. But don't take my word for it, go and order yourself a yummy pizza from it. It's very very good.

name: HerbnKathyRV
text: Great service, lots of staff, clean dining room, walk up to the counter, choose your ingredients, a few minutes later your pizza is through the oven and they call your name to pick it up. Thin crust cooks quickly.  Good pizza and quick for lunch or dinner.  Fresh salads too!

name: Casey Deines
text: Custom fire  backed personal pizzas. Enjoyable and fast.

name: Daniella Shirey
text: Probably our new favorite personal pizza joint. The pizzas are delicious and the entire experience took relatively little time or effort - prices are fair

name: josie gonzales
text: Always fresh, great service and online ordering with curb side pick up is a plus!

name: Ian Valenzuela
text: Blaze Pizza refused to give money to my school even though I bought the food for a fundraiser.  Dishonorable, deceitful behavior.  Freaking stealing from kids.  Do not go to this DISHONEST store.

name: Kevin Burke
text: I celebrated my PhD last night in this great place. I am glad to say that we passed a great evening and the place was evidently one of the reasons for the fruitful meeting. The crew  helped in a very nice style, the cooking was very good ‚Ä¶More

name: Cody Corona
text: Pretty cool came during corona. Totally would come back

name: Tabitha Thomas
text: This was my first time at this restaurant. I wish I could‚Äôve given them a five-star review. The atmosphere was inviting and the ambiance was relaxing. However, I just didn‚Äôt have the best customer service experience. Sad to say I will most likely not return.

name: Bill Larson
text: Really good...and good sized pizza...brought some home

name: Belen Olmos
text: Good pizza good service..

name: Zach Blanchard
text: Good pizza, and they offer a gluten free option. I wouldn't say that it's safe for celiacs though. There was a lot of cross contamination, and the employees weren't very informed on how to handle the gluten free dough.

name: Joel King
text: Nice selection of toppings, crust was a little dark on the bottom for us.

name: Nicholas Ansloan
text: Fast & friendly service, fair prices, and a large variety of pizzas, salads, and deserts! It‚Äôs like a much better version of Wise Pies!

name: Pernell Begay
text: Very fast and friendly service. Pizza is great.

name: Gerrit Kruidhof
text: Make-your-own pizza place that does a good job and has plenty of options to make the perfect pie for your flavor profile.  They even have gluten-free crust option and do a decent job of attempting to prevent contamination for those with ‚Ä¶More

name: beees
text: As a vegan, I really appreciate the options!! The high rise dough is exactly what I've been craving in a pizza, really satisfying! One of my new favorite fast food places. I love the cheese and vegan chorizo ‚ù§

name: John Bevz
text: We tried to place an order here 45 minutes before close and we were treated with blatant disrespect. They answered the phone coughing and laughing. They were obviously smoking and laughing too hard to take the order. I asked to speak to the ‚Ä¶More

name: John Sturgis
text: Great grub!  Love Blaze Pizza. Custom pies just the way I like it. My favorite is the Hot Link with pepperoni and green chile added. Prices are reasonable and the service is prompt and friendly. We‚Äôre regulars and will continue to visit Blaze Pizza.

name: Misty Buck
text: Our family of 6 went to Blaze Pizza for the first time today. The pizza was great! The salad was tasty.  Everyone loved what they ordered. Randall was amazingly helpful. He was patient and kind to the employee he was obviously training while at the same time making us feel relaxed and not rushed. We will definitely be back.

name: Kaley Goatcher
text: Amazing food, amazing service! Would definitely recommend over WisePies any day!

name: John-Michael Vaisa
text: The pizza is great! The ingredients are fresh and the pizza was cooked fast.  They have many drink options besides the normal soda options. The staff is super friendly.

name: Mr. Kesselring
text: This is one of our favorite pizza places! It‚Äôs affordable, fast, and delicious. I like a lot of variety in my toppings which this place offers. I also like a thicker crust, which Blaze offers for only $2 more. The drink options are also ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Essenmacher
text: Staff is friendly and the food is great!

name: Alejandro Espinoza
text: Pizza is fantastic. Cheap and you can wash it all down with a beer. Staff was pretty friendly and the overall experience was positive. I definitely recommend a visit if you are in the area.

name: Christina Viera
text: Actaully Fast this time and always delicious

name: Winton L. Smith, Jr.
text: First time visit. Selected "build your own" excellent pizza. Staff super friendly and sincere. Would definitely recommend to friends and come back for another taste.

name: Darcy
text: I'm gluten free. I tried the 2 new crusts and was allergic to them. I'm so glad they have the classic gluten free crust. It's rare to find delicious pizza.

name: Brittany Butler
text: Great pizza and order comes very quick!

name: Kyle Lacy
text: Great thin crust pizzas and excellent service. Jacob was excellent in helping us get checked out and provided exceptional customer service! Will be back!

name: Corcoran Keefe
text: Great pizza at an honest price.

name: Alabama Jones
text: They are at the top for pizza places .Cheap fresh ingredients  and build your own

name: RHOTECH RHOTECH
text: I felt rushed through the line and the salad looked dry and appeared to be there for hours . everett was rude and over charged us to add build your own charge to add chicken to the salad. He made a remark to my husband at least you are not picky due me knowing what I prefer on my pizza. Never will step foot at that location.

name: David Martin
text: Last two times I have been here they have messed up my order.  This last time they forget my dough knots we asked for them and when we got it looks like they burned it on purpose.  Other places to eat in town. Won't be back

name: Jadd Mustafa
text: Really loved this place pizza is good. But the service is so jumpy and not patient. I haven‚Äôt even finished walking in and they wanted me to have my order ready ‚ÄúYou ready‚Äù ‚Äúwhat u want‚Äù ‚Äúis that all‚Äù. I hate feeling rushed and not getting ‚Ä¶More

name: Gavin D
text: Pretty sure ive reviewed this place before, but the location i was last at really looked nice on the interior, and had comfy and spacious seating. The welcoming atmosphere made up for the slower serving time. 10/7 would go again

name: Steven Henderson
text: Always a good spot to get a slice, wish they had a rewards program tho, and it's always cold in there. My son loves how he can build his own pizza.

name: Marcus Damberger
text: One pizza will fill you up pleanty. Lunch rush is always full of people. Good selection of drinks Frescas and lemonade as well as some alternative pop drinks. As well as beer.

name: Kay W
text: They have very good pizza. It is kind of like a Chipotle in that you decide what base you want then go down a line adding the ingredients that you want. The people working at this location are very friendly and were willing to help in any ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian
text: Love the pizza especially with gorgonzola.

name: Greg Szabo
text: First time at a Blaze Pizza after a long day at work... ended up dropping my pizza before getting in the truck. Not a fan of the pizza box design...

name: Tim Vee
text: The staff were professional and very excited to see me. The pizza was delicious and was made very quickly. Their build your own pizza was amazing!

name: Yvette Wilson
text: Great food. Wonderful experience.  Lots of toppings for pizza and salads.  Great staff, clean and kid friendly.

name: Abigail Avalos
text: Love eating here! Their pizzas are so good and I always enjoy their salads.

name: Rosemary Pagliaro
text: Great place and great food. They have all the pizza fixings you could need. They even have gluten-free pizza crusts and dairy free cheese or vegan cheese. Not to mention great drink options.

name: Brandywine S
text: I love Blaze Pizza! I went to this location for their grand opening to get my free pizza and I've been hooked ever since. You can get as many toppings as you want for the same price and all the toppings are fresh and delicious. And if you want extra of a topping all you have to do is ask.

name: Sarae Smiel
text: GREAT PIZZA AND GREAT SERVICE!

name: Tim Sheryl
text: Very few pizza places offer cauliflower crust pizzas for us keto practitioners, but Blaze does, and it's good pizza at a decent price.

name: Michael Vigil
text: Better than Wise Pies

name: Edwin Y
text: Never a regret. Great tasting pizza. Great service and nice dining room experience

name: April Ortiz
text: Great pizza, I am vegan and daughter is not.  They were very conscientious to not cross contaminate and the pizza was really delicious!

name: Lardex
text: The service was great and I liked the food pretty good. Tim was especially great and made the experience even better.

name: Ty Hudson
text: Fast food pizza for dine in or to go. I enjoy the build your own with unlimited toppings. Recently tried the high rise dough instead of the cracker crust for an additional $2.00 but was not impressed. Good prices, pizza the way you want it and ready in about 5 minutes. What more could you ask? Will be back.

name: David Robinson
text: My wife and I came here after seeing ad about the low carb pizza crust and this place is ABSOLUTELY the best. The pizza's were amazing and the staff was exceptionally nice. The restaurant was clean and the team leader Tyler was very ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Ward
text: Nice place with amazing food. If you are on a diet or have food allergies, then this place is perfect as they give numerous options to help fit your taste and diet.

name: Patricia Fain
text:
Best glutin free pizza crust ever. 50% cauliflower.
Love building my own pizza

name: Cindy Rodriguez
text: This was the first time eating here and my family and I really liked the pizza.  My husband and I shared a salad which was also good.  I just wish they had something like cut up veggies as a choice of side because my son doesn't eat salad. The price was fair. I  felt the music was a little loud. We do plan on eating here again.

name: Michael Mlechick
text: Ok service  employees  need more  training

name: Charles Borchini Jr.
text: A great pizza restaurant! If you like fast and variety than Blaze is for you! It's a small round thin crust pizza that's ready in about 5 minutes. They also have a great selection of local sodas.

name: Victor Mike Golf
text: Not bad pizza. Order was ready fairly quickly.

name: Aaron N
text: After a long day at work, I stopped by to grab a pizza to enjoy later at home. There was no line at the counter and I was able to walk right up to start my order. I chose the two top pizza, and as always, was able to choose my ideal ‚Ä¶More

name: Juan Velasco
text: Pizza was great and staff was awesome came to check on us a few times and make sure all was good.  Appreciate the attention to quality.

name: Jeremiah Ordway
text: I'm not usually a fan of thin crust pizza, but this pizza was awesome! We got a green stripe and a BYO (Build your own). It was so good, my little man (4 y/o) ate three slices. They were made like a subway sandwich assembly line style, then ‚Ä¶More

name: Edward Haynes
text: First visit to Blaze. Came in for take-out.  Friendly staff. Very helpful to explain how ordering was done. Blaze is our new favorite pizza place in Albuquerque. Looking forward to buuilding next pizza. üëç

name: Valerie Martinez
text: Usually great,  but the service was terrible tonight. They couldn't even serve alchohol because they didn't have anyone over 21 to sell alcohol. Pizza was subpar...not sure if I'll be coming back anytime soon

name: Squire_.
text: Great pizza. Crust is thin, but otherwise pretty good.

name: Bryana Montoya
text: You get to go in and make your own style of pizza or even pick a classic. They have amazing gluten free crust. Then they cook it for you. They also have a good drink selection.

name: DRok
text: Amazing (gourmet) pizza üî• with excellent prices and specials. Not like any other pizza joint, different taste that won't disappoint. Fun atmosphere with shuffleboard area that will keep you entertained. I even put off picking up my order because I kept saying one more game.... üòÇ

name: Joe Solomon
text: Good place for a quick, great tasting meal. Good prices, great selection of salads and pizzas. Beer? Check. Wine? Check. Friendly, helpful staff? Check!

name: Kimberly
text: A little pricy but the dough knots are the bomb. Place is very clean, staff is super friendly. Will probably go back.

name: Kahome Tempest
text: Really good pizza. The crust isnt too thin or thicc, it's just right. I like the sauce as well. Would come back again

name: Brett J
text: Build your own pizza. Oven baked. Very tasty. Think Subway with pizza but better.

name: NmBeardedMan
text: Great experience and amazing pizza.  We where headed else where and saw this place. So we gave it a shot. Glad we did...   Sorry no photos ate it all so fast.

name: Stan Alexander
text: Blaze Pizza offers a good selection of choices. It is an attractive restaurant and priced for any budget. I do recommend giving this place a try when you next or interested in going out for pizza.

name: Justin Prisk
text: Like Subway crossed with gourmet pizza plus 100! Delicious

name: julie Rill
text: Amazing food, fun concept and fast! Also well priced

name: Dr. Dianna Dekelaita-Mullet

name: Angel Chabai
text:
For all my food allergy or dietary restriction peeps-

BLAZE pizza is AMAZING at keeping food allergies and dietary restrictions in ‚Ä¶More

text: Great food friendly people and very clean

name: Daniel O

name: Thad B
text: Excellent pizza and good service.

name: Martina Holloway
text: My mouth is watering just thinking about their Pizza! Fresh ingredients and eclectic choices.

name: Arkturus Landing

text: The staff seemed to all enjoying their job thoroughly. The atmosphere is great with comfortable seating, great music and great drinks (including specialty drinks). Blaze Pizza has starting using the lids that can be used without a straw. ‚Ä¶More

text: Staff is super friendly especially Sharell (sorry if I spelled name wrong) she was awesome! great customer service. Delicious pizza I love the keto crust, fresh toppings love it!

name: Jerica Alviz

name: Francheska Sanchez
text: Very good pizza and service. The keto crust is amazing!!

name: Thatgal Youlike
text: Staff was very welcoming and nice. Food was great, thanks guys! üò¨

name: Tina Sanders
text: It was the greatest pizza place that we have visited it is like subway but it's Pizza way üôÇ

text: Incredible!  For under $10 you can have anything from a selection of 42 toppings and sauces you want.  Sausage! Chile! Mushrooms! Pineapple! Ham! Apple-wood smoked bacon! Fresh basil! Roasted garlic!  The list goes on and on. You have to try it! Amazing!

name: Gregory LaVoie
text: Good pizza such fresh ingredients

name: Michael VanBaalen
text: Very good pizza, just learn to ask for extra toppings. Even though it looks like enough when they are baking it....it is not.

name: Ann Shirah
text: Build your own pizza- with an employees help. Great choices. Salads and pastries as well.

name: Mark Smith
text: I like getting a really good pizza so quickly. Amazing selection of toppings,  and I like the pricing structure.

name: Sara Mones
text: Great pizza! The guys just need to be a little more sanitary.

name: Cheney Perry-Hill
text: Really good pizza. SLOW service. I came here with family on my lunch break once and it took us so long to get our food that I didn‚Äôt get to eat with them. So today I called 30 minutes early from lunch. Guess what? STILL NOT READY ON TIME! I ‚Ä¶More

text: Always busy during lunch, they do a great job and getting all food out in a timely manner. Staff is always friendly and courteous. Overall great location

text: Just picked up my pizza and only one slice had cheese on it!  And other toppings all slid around. Horrible. Too busy and kids too hungry to deal with it.

name: Patrick Holland
text: Slow going but good foon nontheless.

name: Ryan Downey
text: Good put it together yourself pizza place

text: Very good pizza to order. Easy-going atmosphere and clean.  Very reasonable prices.  Recommend for a good lunch with coworkers and/or friends.

name: Raine R
text: Blaze pizza has amazing food and an even more amazing atmosphere

I tried and they lost me .  frustrating to order a pizza ??/  forget it  I THREW THE COUPON IN THE TRASH

name: Cristobal Molina Alfaro
text: It's quick, good, and not over priced. They have really good teas and fruit waters.

name: Ryan Nordgren

text: It was a lot of fun. The food was delicious, the portions were just right, and it was a lot less expensive then some other places that we enjoy going. The size of the pizza is perfect for just two people. I got the thin-crust. It was fantastic. Get the build your own, and put as mini topics as you want on the pizza.

name: Jesse Samuel
text: Tasty build your own pizza

name: Adam Anderson
text: Good food. Fast service. Clean restrooms. Overall great!

name: Nancy Hamilton
text: One of my favorite pizza places. Fresh ingredients and fire cooked. Very friendly staff. I usually visit during off-prak times, so not much I'd a wait. Two thumbs up! ü§ó

name: odyssey36
text: Unlimited Toppings for $8.75, and amazing crust!

name: trystin otero
text: great pizza, slow service... at least on this visit. not sure if it was the people in front of us or the actual workers that made it so slow, but it took a lot longer than it needed to get through the line. there aren't enough "salad" toppings for the build your own salad

name: Jen Petsche
text:
Great quick pizza joint.

They offer fire blazzed pizzas, and offer gluten free and vegan options. ‚Ä¶More

text: Wonderful selection of ingredients, friendly staff, and a great online allergy menu! ‚Ä¶More

text: Love that have vegan options like daiya and their new vegan chorizo! It‚Äôs just the right amount of spice. The customer service is excellent and they take their time to ensure you‚Äôre satisfied with all the toppings.

name: Kristin Bogopane
text: I love that you can add as much or as little as you want of anything and it's all the same price. Do yourself a favor and whatever you get, top it with balsamic glaze. It'll change your pizza game. Also this is a great pizza: pesto, mozzarella, chicken, basil, tomatoes, salt and oregano, ending with the glaze.

name: Jaclyn Archibeque
text: Food is great! Would be 5 stars if service was better and restaurant was cleaner.

name: Frances Garcia
text: Little pricey for a thin crust. Slightly disorganized- runs like a "Subway" assembly line, but they started someone else's order before completing ours.

name: Jeffrey Qualler
text: Love it. Nice employees. Good food.

name: April Long
text: Neat experiance and great pizza!

name: Kenny Dillingham
text: Fun place to eat. Pizza is good and it's nice that you can make the pizza however you want.

name: DA-NI
text: For quick pizza and you can construct your own using the fresh ingredients they have on display. Love it for it being a quick but nicely made pizza. This is not like having a top of the line Chicago or N.Y.C. Pizza. This is more like a fire custom made pizza in a quick manor.

name: Cesar Barraza
text: Was like the subways of pizza. Unexpectedly good. Service was good and the employees were friendly. The only sad part is that they no longer serve local beers due to management change but other than that it was filling and delicious.

name: Devin Ulrich
text: Great place for dairy-free options and low carb/gluten free options!

name: John Frazee
text: Excellent service and food. A little pricey bit worth it.

name: Robb Randall
text: Very clean, attentive pizza creators, fantastic pizza local beer.  Great place for lunch!!

name: Robert SILVESTRONE
text: Excellent Build your own Pizza with Top Notch Service From Everyone in the Store....YUMMY!!

name: A. Randall
text: Always a nice place to enjoy a pizza.  This was one of the nicer restaurants.  Very clean, and the service was very good.  We took my Mom who is 75 "ish" üòä. It is a bit overwhelming, especially if it is busy.  These young people took the time to answer questions, and explain everything very well.  Good pizza- bonus!!!

text: I was overcharged by $8 or $9. I had initially said no to a copy of the receipt. When I checked my account later I realized I was overcharged. Employees claimed they could not reprint a receipt, and they would pass along my phone number and ‚Ä¶More

text: At first, I expected an uppity and difficult experience from my trying to call the place (as no prices are listed anywhere on the website) which sent me to a call center, not this location i hoped to reach. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ann Quintana
text: Excellent service as well as choices to fit all our dietary needs. Good food too

name: Punk PinkPower
text: Don't go to this location. The staff is super slow - you'll stand in line for half an hour before anyone even talks to you. They are completely unconcerned with rushes and move around like snails. Worst service.

name: Cloe Villegas
text: Good food. The quality can be hit or miss depending on who is making the order.

name: Andrew Abernathy
text: Sadly out of the keto pizza atm. But was good otherwise. Ceasar dressing was really strong as far as fish taste, but not terrible if you don't mind it. Drink choices were wonderful, having the sky blue on tap.

name: Grant Dieken
text: Quick, fast, and delicious! Highly recommend! Employees were very polite! Great experience!

name: Jenna K
text: I loved the Food and The service

text: If you like brick oven pizza this is a really good place.  It is a little pricey but it's a good pizza.  The salads are average, nothing do to flips over.

name: Taylor
text: I love that you can build your own pizza! I asked the guy, "how complicated can I get?" To which he replied, "as complicated as you want, man." I proceeded to make my pizza super complicated...and it was awesome! Also, the gluten free crust is super tasty.

name: Mark Dunn
text: We love Blaze Pizza! The food is great, they have a great selection of Beverages and it is reasonably priced. Definitely check it out.

name: John Rockhold
text:
Great pizza... Quick in the open
oven

text: I come here all the time. The pizza is delicious!!! And the staff there are always super nice! And $7.95 for a pizza with unlimited toppings? Heck yes!

text: Always good pizza, tried the keto crust this time and was not really impressed with it. The place itself was quite dirty and it was before lunch so I was surprised it hadn't been cleaned up at all.

name: Alex Woodworth
text: It‚Äôs food pizza but lately the service cleanliness has been a mess! The staff started out by giving us a half filled salad. It was literally a bites worth. When we asked, they said, ‚Äúthat‚Äôs more hen some people, sometimes I make it even ‚Ä¶More

name: Anthony Wilder
text: Love the price and love the options. I'm vegan and I enjoy the dairy free cheese and vegan churizo.

name: Jamie Douglas
text: The pizza was good, there's Blue Sky in the soda machine, and the staff were super friendly and helpful. Lots of options for people with allergies and sensitivities, and for vegans. Good experience, will be returning.

name: chase connelly
text: keto pizza was okay but normal crust is great!:)

name: Logan Herrera
text: Blaze Pizza just opened up in Albuquerque not too long ago and their pizza choices are awesome. The food is delicious and they walk you through the steps of getting your pizza just right! Plus it's really affordable. On the way down to the register, you'll see some desserts and drinks as well. Stop by and you'll be glad you did!

name: V. Montoya
text: Great tasting pizza.  Reasonably priced.  Very fast service.  Will definitely return

name: Sean C
